sentence: Trump asked Josh whether he should endorse David McCormick — whom he met with later on Wednesday at Mar-a-Lago — or Mehmet Oz in the Republican primary to replacing retiring Sen. Pat Toomey (R-Pa.).
title: The Post's interview with Donald Trump

sentence: The celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz, whose TV career was given liftoff by Oprah Winfrey and who left it behind to run for the Senate in Pennsylvania, has a personal fortune of $76 million to $300 million, he disclosed Wednesday night in a government filing.
title: Wawa Stock and $500,000 in Cattle: Dr. Oz’s Senate Bid Reveals His Wealth

sentence: Trump said he’d make a decision in “about a week” between endorsing McCormick or Mehmet Oz.
title: Trump says Secret Service blocked him from joining Jan. 6 march to the Capitol

sentence: Trump also made an exclusive backstage announcement of an official endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz in the Pennsylvania GOP Senate primary.
author: Eric Mack
title: Donald Trump to Newsmax: Remember, Nancy Pelosi Was in Charge of Security on Jan. 6

sentence: Trump: I’ve gotta be the cleanest— I think I’m the most honest human being perhaps that god ever created pic.twitter.com/D98itzA6vi — Acyn (@Acyn) April 10, 2022 If there was one bit of actual news to be gleaned from Trump’s North Carolina appearance last night, it was his endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz for the Republican nomination for Senator in Pennsylvania.
